column4: search for and replace all occurrences of 'libflashplayer.so'
yes, but if it's present in your user plugins folder too, it will over-ride
but I am getting no flash at all, so what is overriding?
newbieme: if I put libflashplayer.so in ~/.mozilla/plugins, then it works. If I put it in /usr/lib/firefox/plugins it doesn't work. I don't really understand why...
